subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Colts rallied from an 18-point deficit, then traded scores in a thrilling second half to stun the Patriots and send Peyton Manning and Coach Tony Dungy to the Super Bowl for the first time.
snippet: The Colts rallied from an 18-point deficit, then traded scores in a thrilling second half to stun the Patriots and send Peyton Manning and Coach Tony Dungy to the Super Bowl for the first time.
